email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Carter,

We are pleased to offer the MV OCEAN STAR (DWT: 150,000, LOA: 300m) for your shipment of 25,000MT steel coils from Busan to Los Angeles. The starting freight quote is USD 75.00 per tonne on CIF terms. Laycan is 15-20 October. Demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day.

Please let us know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Emma Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Emma,

Thank you for the offer. USD 75.00 per tonne seems a bit high. Can you revise the rate to USD 70.00? Also, can you confirm the vessel's availability for a laycan of 18-23 October?

Best regards,
James Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

We can offer a revised rate of USD 72.50 per tonne. The vessel is available for the adjusted laycan of 18-23 October. Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emma Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Emma,

USD 72.50 is still higher than our target. Can you do USD 71.00? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate remains at USD 25,000 per day?

Best regards,
James Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

We can agree to USD 71.00 per tonne. The demurrage rate remains at USD 25,000 per day. Please confirm your acceptance, and we will proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Emma Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Emma,

We accept the offer at USD 71.00 per tonne. Please send the summary of terms for our records.

Best regards,
James Carter

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Here is the summary of terms:
- Vessel: MV OCEAN STAR
- Cargo: 25,000MT Steel Coils
- Load Port: Busan
- Discharge Port: Los Angeles
- Laycan: 18-23 October
- Freight: USD 71.00 per tonne
- Demurrage: USD 25,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Emma Wilson
